00169 #define RKH_CREATE_COMP_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,defchild,history )  \
00170                                                                         \
00171                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00172                                 {                                       \
00173                                     mkbase(RKH_COMPOSITE,id,name),      \
00174                                     mkcomp(en,ex,parent,name,           \
00175                                                 defchild,history)       \
00176                                 }
00177 
00178 
00197 #define RKH_CREATE_BASIC_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,prepro )           \
00198                                                                         \
00199                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00200                                 {                                       \
00201                                     mkbase(RKH_BASIC,id,name),          \
00202                                     mkbasic(en,ex,parent,name,prepro)   \
00203                                 }
00204 
00227 #define RKH_CREATE_COND_STATE( name,id,cdt )                            \
00228                                                                         \
00229                                 rkhrom RKHSCOND_T name =                \
00230                                 {                                       \
00231                                     mkbase(RKH_CONDITIONAL,id,name),    \
00232                                     cdt, name##_trtbl                   \
00233                                 }
00234 
00235 
00253 #define RKH_CREATE_JUNCTION_STATE( name,id,action,target )              \
00254                                                                         \
00255                                 rkhrom RKHSJUNC_T name =                \
00256                                 {                                       \
00257                                     mkbase(RKH_JUNCTION,id,name),       \
00258                                     action, target                      \
00259                                 }

00278 #define RKH_CREATE_DEEP_HISTORY_STATE( name,id,parent )                 \
00279                                                                         \
00280                                 static rkhrom RKHSREG_T *ram##name;     \
00281                                                                         \
00282                                 rkhrom RKHSHIST_T name =                \
00283                                 {                                       \
00284                                     mkbase(RKH_DHISTORY,id,name),       \
00285                                     parent,&ram##name                   \
00286                                 }

00308                                                                         \
00309                                 rkhrom RKHSHIST_T name =                \
00310                                 {                                       \

00312                                     parent,&ram##name                   \
